## Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the [coding standards](https://github.com/mavlink/qgroundcontrol/blob/master/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md#coding-standards) (C++20, Qt 6 guidelines)

- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] My code has no compiler warnings
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
